transcript: What is strategy probably one of my favorite definitions in business strategy big fancy word for priorities it's like entire books written about prioritization they probably call probably sound less sexy if that's what it is but that's all it is it's how you allocate limited resources time money effort against unlimited options you have a million things you could possibly do but you only have this much time this much money and the people who move fastest in life are just better at picking where they invest that's strategy not to say you shouldn't improve your email deliverability but unless it's the thing holding back your business you should probably do something else
